channel.title: Help with torvapkz 637
channel.description: Alright so I have been changing drops and drop% but when I look at a boss that has a rare drop rate at 100% I try to add that onto another monster like the minions at Nex. I make a new drop and I call the item ID Rare like in Nex's drops and it changes to -1. I really cant figure out how to make the drops listed rare as Nex's are. If the drop% is what makes it rare or not that would be good to mention. Thanks for reading this and hope you could help me. :)

item.title: Help with torvapkz 637
item.dc:creator: @Chiller Chiller
item.description:
@Chiller wrote:

Alright so I have been changing drops and drop% but when I look at a boss that has a rare drop rate at 100% I try to add that onto another monster like the minions at Nex. I make a new drop and I call the item ID Rare like in Nex’s drops and it changes to -1. I really cant figure out how to make the drops listed rare as Nex’s are. If the drop% is what makes it rare or not that would be good to mention. Thanks for reading this and hope you could help me.

Read full topic
